title: U.S. consumers who use marijuana 2019 , by age group
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of respondents. In total the number of data points it has is 4.
Overall Share of respondents has decreased over the Year.
Share of respondents is roughly constant from 18-29_years to 50-64_years, and finally slightly decreasing from 50-64_years to 65+_years.
Maximum Share of respondents, about 22.0 was reported at Year 18-29_years
Minimum Share of respondents about 3.0 was reached at Year 65+_years
